short_summary: A 2-year maintenance contract with an additional one (1) one-year option period in support of the fire detection and protection systems located at the Eureka Weather Station, Nunavut.
description: Socio-economic provisions are included under this solicitation, but it is not mandatory for Bidders to identify socio-economic benefits provisions to qualify for the resulting contract. Refer to the Inuit Benefits Plan (IBP) as outlined within the submission and evaluation requirements of the attached Request for Proposal.
